document_data.name: Baruz
document_data.mainbody: '''Verthisathurgiesh Baruz''' was a [[dragonborn]] member of [[Clan Verthisathurgiesh]] in [[1486 DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Baruz was the third son of [[Verthisathurgiesh Anala]].
document_data.History:
Baruz was one of the few known members of the [[Liberators of the Steel Sky]].

On [[Nightal 15]] of 1486 DR, Baruz was killed, alongside his fellow companions of the Liberators,
